item.title: Analyzing NFL Team Performance, A Streamlit-Powered Exploration
item.description: Combining my passion for data analysis and coding, this Python and Streamlit application examines NFL team performance throughout a season. This tool is just the start to providing a sophisticated understanding of the ebbs and flows of an NFL season. Key Features: Interactive Chart Users can select an NFL team and season to visually assess the cumulative score differential across the entire season. For a historical perspective, delve into the 2007 NE Patriots season below, a demonstration of absolute dominance.
